!Gandi Chief Chianta: The renegade Orc tribes you must find are the *Breka, Enku, Vuku, Turek, and Lennunt!* Five tribes all together! Ask *Seer Manakia of Giran Castle Town* about the Breka and Enku tribes! The other three tribes, the Vuku, Turek, and Lennunt, will be found in the west. Ask *Prefect Kasman of Gludin* for further information about them. Come back to me when you have recovered all of the seals from these lower Orc tribes! Now be on your way! For the honor of the greater Orc kingdom!
